recipe.title: Ice Cream with Roasted Grapes and Walnut Oil
ingredients: 6 teaspoons walnut or pistachio oil, divided
1/4 cup coarsely chopped walnuts or pistachios, toasted
instructions: Toss grapes with 2 teaspoons oil in a shallow baking pan and broil 5 to 6 inches from heat just until grapes burst, about 6 minutes.
Spoon grapes with juice over scoops of ice cream, then sprinkle with nuts and drizzle each serving with 1 teaspoon of remaining oil.
